text: Eghtɨ ofa gamir dakozimɨn ruarim 45 sentimitan tugh, eghtɨ an arozim an ruarimɨn mɨrara mangɨ 45 sentimitan tugh, eghtɨ an tuirivim 90 sentimitan tugh. Egh temer akasɨn ofa gamir dakozimɨn ingarizimra, ia bulmakaun kombar mɨn garir bizibar ingarightɨ, da ofa gamir dakozimɨn mɨkebaba vaghvagh dar ikɨ.
